mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_GALLERY (free_title, free_contents, username, write_time) VALUES (#{free_title}, #{free_contents}, #{username}, #{write_time})
mapper.select: SELECT fg.*, a.nickname FROM FREE_GALLERY AS fg JOIN members AS a ON fg.username = a.username ORDER BY free_number DESC LIMIT #{First}, #{amount}
select count(*) AS gallery_free_total from FREE_GALLERY
